HT_Text_Aka_1_Crocotail_Escaped1.message:
Phew, I thought I was I was gonna be in troube there! If you hadn't come along I might've been!

I really don't know what's got into those Crabhands and their Wasp Spider pets lately.

HT_Text_Aka_1_Crocotail_Escaped2.message: I just need to catch my breath..<E>

HT_Text_Aka_BrokenDome_Sleepy1.message: Zzz... Huh? Wha? Oh hello there. Wow what's happened here, where is everyone?<E>

HT_Text_Aka_BrokenDome_Sleepy1a.message: Looks like those blasted Abydosians attacked us again, trust me to sleep through it. I always miss all the excitement.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_BrokenDome_Sleepy1b.message:
If you want to go and see the King, crystal keys are the only way out once the area is sealed off.

Don't touch any water while you have a crystal . . . They're made of salt you know . . .

HT_Text_Aka_BrokenDome_Sleepy1c.message: Anyway, I guess I should go to the palace but I'm so tired I think I'll stay here and catch up on my beauty sleep.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_BrokenDome_Sleepy3.message:
Even I couldn't sleep through that din! Those Abydosians have got no respect for us folk trying to rest.

Now leave me alone, I'm very tired.

HT_Text_Aka_1_Sleepy_Flood_Tale1.message: Oh, what a disaster! They've broken through the dome and now water is everywhere!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_1_Sleepy_Flood_Tale2.message: and the worse thing of all . . . I had to move! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_1_Sleepy_Flood_Tale3.message: I need to catch up on lost time . . . good night!<W 30>

HT_Text_Aka_1_Sleepy_Killed_Crabhands.message: No, no, no . . . don't . . . don't kill me!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_BrokenDome_Civilian1.message: Run for your life! They're everywhere!<W 60>

HT_Text_Aka_TempleInterior_Worshipper1.message: Get out of our temple, you heretic!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_TempleInterior_Worshipper2.message: Ishka is not here, leave us be.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_TempleInterior_Worshipper3.message: Get out godless one! There is nothing for you here.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Guard1a.message:
Halt! You can't pass unless you have an Oxygen Ankh

It is a very long swim to Ishka's Temple and even us Akarians cannot hold our breath that long.

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Guard1b.message: Sorry but I cannot allow you to pass without an Oxygen Ankh.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Guard1c.message:
I see you have an Oxygen Ankh, you may pass.

However use caution, many mines litter the path to Ishka's temple and the sea creatures are far from friendly.

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Guard2a.message: Forget about me, you must stop Ishka before it's too late!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Guard2b.message: Take this Oxygen Ankh, I won't be needing it any more.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Servant1.message:
The King is busy right now with his advisor Ishka. I wouldn't disturb them if I were you.

The King is a good man but lately Ishka has been behaving very strangely.

I'm sure he is up to something but it is not my place to judge the Kings advisors.

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Servant1a.message: I knew Ishka was up to no good!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Servant2a.message: We have you to thank for revealing Ishka for the traitor that he is. I hope you are as successful at delivering his punishment.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_Iskha1a.message: You are too late brat, the crown is mine and soon chaos will rule over all <E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King1a.message: What business have you here, young sir? I have many problems to deal with at present.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King1b.message: What is that? A message from the Mayor of <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>? Very interesting, give it to me. <W 30>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King1c.message: This is most surprising. The Abydosians think we are the aggressors and they seek a peace treaty. <W 30>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King1d.message: We have committed no acts of war against them, we were defending ourselves from their attacks! <W 30>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King1e.message: Ishka, you informed me that the Abydosians were attacking us in preparation for an invasion. <E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King1f.message: This peace treaty offer seems to prove that you have been lying to me, I demand an explanation! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King2.message:
I thank you for bringing me this information, you have done the Akarian people a great service.

Now I must request that you perform another, more dangerous service to me and my people.

Ishka must be punished for his treachery and I think you are the perfect man for the job.

Ishka has probably retreated to his temple beyond the minefield. The way is treacherous but with your will and determination I am convinced you will succeed.

When you find Ishka, show no mercy. He has betrayed the Akarians and brought us to the brink of war with the Abydosians.

Take this artifact, it is a magical Crocodile Scale which will improve your swimming ability. It should help you negotiate the minefield. Good luck.

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King3.message: You must seek Ishka. He is most likely to be taking refuge in his temple beyond the minefield. Please hurry!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Palace_King4.message:
The hero of Akaria has returned! Words cannot express my gratitude for your elimination of the traitor Ishka.

Please take my crown as a reward for your heroic deeds.

Rest assured that future generations of the Akarian people will remember the name Sphinx. May your enemies fall easily beneath your blade.

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1a1a.message: What are you doing here? Everyone was supposed to be evacuated.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1a1b.message: Those Abydosians attacked us again, I think it's time we started fighting back but that's up to the King I guess.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1a2a.message: What in the name of Ra was that?! It sounds like another Abydosian attack.<W 60>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1a2b.message: I'd better go and find out what's happening!<W 40>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1a2c.message:
Oh no! The dome has been breached! All those people..

Quick, you have to go and tell the king! It's a disaster!

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1a2d.message: Hurry, there's no time to lose!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1b1.message:
The passage to the palace has been sealed! The only way to unlock the door is to get all three coloured crystals from the broken dome.

You go and get them while I stay here in case someone opens the door from the other side.

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1b2.message: You still haven't collected all the crystals? Hurry, we must inform the King!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1b3.message: What took you so long? Hurry, open the door.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1b4.message: The palace is just ahead, lead the way I'll be right behind you.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1b5.message: I am palace guard Garek, my friend here helped me escape the broken dome.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard1b6.message: We must see the King immediately, there has been another attack.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard2a1.message: Access to the palace is limited to palace officials only....<W 30>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard2a2.message: OK you had better go inside.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Slide_Guard2b1.message: By order of King Sobek of Akaria.<W 30>

HT_Text_Aka_1_Open_3crystal_Door_Guard1.message: Now lets get to the palace and warn the King! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_Minefield_Guard3.message: It was Ishka, he went into the minefield. You'll need an Oxygen Ankh, it's too far to hold your breath.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_TempleInterior_ChasingWorshi.message: If you are not an Akarian you must leave at once, with each footstep you taint this temple with your impurity.<E>
The pearls are the only things that can protect us now. We are sworn to protect them with our lives. <E>
Ishka must have gone down to the altar too try and save the city he cannot be disturbed.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_TempleInterior_StandingWorsh.message: We are praying for 'erm, world peace and love for all, now leave before you annoy me further.<E>
If you do not leave we cannot finish our incantation, I mean prayer.<E>
Were you sent here to test my patience?  O lord why do you test our virtue.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_Dungeon_Room3_FakeWorshipper.message: Oh stranger what has become of my brethren.<E>
I found these secret tunnels last week and have been trapped here ever since with these vile skeleton imposters.<E>
The only thing I know for sure is that if you put magic pearls on the stands you will cause a cavein and we will all die.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_OxygenAnkhCollected.message: You collected the Oxygen Ankh. This magical artifact will enable you to breathe underwater!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_SaltCrystalLost.message: Your salt crystal dissolved in the water! <DP><W 60>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1a.message: I must admire your persistence in jeopardizing our plans to steal the crown.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1b.message: Yes, we electrified the water. Yes, we stole the museum's jewels. Yes, we poisoned that childish Mayor.<E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1c.message: But everything has indeed been worthwhile. Behold this magnificent object that our lord of darkness is so intent on retrieving!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1d.message:
Anubis and his foolish minions such as yourself, are insects in comparison to the glory of the great god Set!

He deceived the people of Luxor with his cunning, and soon the Castle of Uruk will cast its shadow over all lands!

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1e.message: Look at his army, if you can call it such! Hahaha! This is all he could muster to retrieve the artifact?! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1f.message: Insignificant little creature! You cannot stop the apocalypse that runs parallel to Set's destiny! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Transform1g.message: You will not live to understand the power of this crown... Prepare to die!<E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Take_Crown_Osiris_prese.message: You do not comprehend the true power of that crown.<E>
You have placed yourself in great peril by retrieving it.<E>
You are either very foolish, or very brave.<E>
But are you the One of the Prophecy? We shall see...<E>

Take this Gold Ankh as a reward for your achievement.

This magic artifact has increased your health capacityby 1 Ankh and has fully replenished your health!

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1a.message: I'm glad you are alive, my boy. Your recovery took five long, foul-smelling days, after we found you lying down in the Iskha refuge!  <E>

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1b.message: Many thanks for defeating Ishka! You showed us the truth behind the lies! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1c.message: I promise to end this senseless war between the Abydosians and the Akarians! <E>

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1c1.message: Come closer my boy, I can hardly see you. <W 60>

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1d.message: He tells us to keep the crown as a token of his appreciation, at the end we got what we were after and he admire that in a man <E>

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1e.message: Please, use this door to teleport yourself freely between your world and ours as you please. <E>

HT_Text_Aka_2_King_Thanks_Door1f.message: He wishes you the best of luck, and welcomes you with open arms to our kingdom. <E>

HT_Text_Aka_dng6_Iskha_Die.message:
You cannot control the power of Ra!

You... are... NOTHING!
